languages.text: "Судно, преисполненное скверной из-за вуали... Печальное и предостерегающее зрелище. Никто не достоин подобной участи — ни дети Азуриана, ни твой вид, элантах".
"A vessel overwhelmed by corruption from beyond the veil... A sad and cautionary sight. No one deserves such a fate — not the Children of Asuryan, nor your kind, elantach."
languages.original_text: "Судно, преисполненное скверной из-за вуали... Печальное и предостерегающее зрелище. Никто не достоин подобной участи — ни дети Азуриана, ни твой вид, элантах".

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “那艘舰船被面纱之外的腐化吞没……真是悲伤又令人警醒的景象。没有人应当遭受这样的命运，不论是阿苏焉之子，还是你的族人，外界人。”
languages.original_text: "A vessel overwhelmed by corruption from beyond the veil... A sad and cautionary sight. No one deserves such a fate — not the Children of Asuryan, nor your kind, elantach."

traits.locale_text: “那艘舰船被面纱之外的腐化吞没……真是悲伤又令人警醒的景象。没有人应当遭受这样的命运，不论是阿苏焉之子，还是你的族人，外界人。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Un vaisseau gangrené par une corruption venue de par delà le voile... Une tragédie... et une mise en garde. Nul ne mérite pareil destin. Ni les enfants d'Asuryan, ni vos congénères, elantach. »
languages.original_text: "A vessel overwhelmed by corruption from beyond the veil... A sad and cautionary sight. No one deserves such a fate — not the Children of Asuryan, nor your kind, elantach."

traits.locale_text: « Un vaisseau gangrené par une corruption venue de par delà le voile... Une tragédie... et une mise en garde. Nul ne mérite pareil destin. Ni les enfants d'Asuryan, ni vos congénères, elantach. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Una nave abrumada por la corrupción desde el otro lado del velo... una historia trágica y una advertencia. Nadie merece ese destino... ni los hijos de Asuryan ni tu pueblo, elantach».
languages.original_text: "A vessel overwhelmed by corruption from beyond the veil... A sad and cautionary sight. No one deserves such a fate — not the Children of Asuryan, nor your kind, elantach."

traits.locale_text: «Una nave abrumada por la corrupción desde el otro lado del velo... una historia trágica y una advertencia. Nadie merece ese destino... ni los hijos de Asuryan ni tu pueblo, elantach».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「ヴェールの向こうの腐敗に見舞われた船か…悲しくも警告に満ちた光景だ。このような運命は誰にも似合わぬ…アシュリアンの御子にも、エランタ、あなたの同胞にも」
languages.original_text: "A vessel overwhelmed by corruption from beyond the veil... A sad and cautionary sight. No one deserves such a fate — not the Children of Asuryan, nor your kind, elantach."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴェールの向こうの腐敗に見舞われた船か…悲しくも警告に満ちた光景だ。このような運命は誰にも似合わぬ…アシュリアンの御子にも、エランタ、あなたの同胞にも」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ein Schiff, das von der Korruption von jenseits des Schleiers überwältigt wurde ... Ein trauriger, mahnender Anblick. Niemand hat ein solches Schicksal verdient — nicht die Kinder von Asuryan und nicht Euresgleichen, Elantach."
languages.original_text: "A vessel overwhelmed by corruption from beyond the veil... A sad and cautionary sight. No one deserves such a fate — not the Children of Asuryan, nor your kind, elantach."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Schiff, das von der Korruption von jenseits des Schleiers überwältigt wurde ... Ein trauriger, mahnender Anblick. Niemand hat ein solches Schicksal verdient — nicht die Kinder von Asuryan und nicht Euresgleichen, Elantach."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "A vessel overwhelmed by corruption from beyond the veil... A sad and cautionary sight. No one deserves such a fate — not the children of Asuryan, nor your kind, elantach."

languages.text: "Örtünün ötesinden gelme yozluğun esiri olmuş bir gemi... Üzücü, ibretlik bir manzara. Ne Asuryan'ın Çocukları ne de türdeşlerin, hiç kimse böyle bir kaderi hak etmez elantach."
languages.original_text: "A vessel overwhelmed by corruption from beyond the veil... A sad and cautionary sight. No one deserves such a fate — not the Children of Asuryan, nor your kind, elantach."

traits.locale_text: "Örtünün ötesinden gelme yozluğun esiri olmuş bir gemi... Üzücü, ibretlik bir manzara. Ne Asuryan'ın Çocukları ne de türdeşlerin, hiç kimse böyle bir kaderi hak etmez elantach."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
